summary: Appendix cancer is a very rare malignant tumor that forms in the vermiform appendix. It encompasses various tumor types, including carcinoids and adenocarcinomas, and can lead to conditions like Pseudomyxoma peritonei.
causes: Metastasis from tumors of the female genital tract
risk_factors: Older age (4th to 5th decades for carcinoids)
Female sex (minor prevalence for neuroendocrine tumors)
Caucasian ethnicity (minor prevalence for neuroendocrine tumors)
diagnosis: Pathological examination of biopsy or resected tissue
